tool_description: The easiest way to scrape Web sites. ScrapingAnt uses the latest Chrome browser and rotates proxies for you.
name: ScrapingAnt
title: ScrapingAnt

api_list.name: GET HTML scraping
api_list.description: Fetch raw HTML from any website using GET request

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
The encoded URL you want to fetch.
IMPORTANT NOTE: there is **NO** need to encode it while using from RapidAPI request builder

optional_parameters.name: js_snippet
optional_parameters.description: A Base64 encoded JavaScript snippet that is run once the page is loaded.

optional_parameters.name: proxy_country
optional_parameters.description:
Proxy country.
Please, select one of the following:
-        'AE'    United Arab Emirates (the)
-        'BR'    Brasilia
-        'CN'    China
-        'DE'    Germany
-        'ES'    Spain
-        'FR'     France
-        'GB'   United Kingdom (the)
-        'HK'   Hong Kong
-        'IN'    India
-        'IT'    Italy
-        'IL'     Israel
-        'JP'   Japan
-        'NL'   Netherlands (the)
-        'RU'   Russia
-        'SA'   Saudi Arabia
-        'US'   USA

optional_parameters.name: response_format
optional_parameters.description:
Defines the response format.
*html* by default.
When *json* used allows receiving a rich response with cookies and other useful information

optional_parameters.name: cookies
optional_parameters.description: Send custom cookies to the page you want to scrape. We currently only handle name and value of custom cookies. If you want to set multiple cookies just separate cookies with ';'. Example: 'cookiename1=cookievalue1;cookiename2=cookievalue_2'

optional_parameters.name: return_text
optional_parameters.description: Fetch this page and return text only or full HTML

optional_parameters.name: wait_for_selector
optional_parameters.description: Valid CSS selector to wait while page load. ScrapingAnt will wait for this selector DOM element appearance and then return the result.
